game.name: Mr Bullet 2
game.description:
The fun, action and thrill will continue in the second instalment of Mr Bullet! All you need to put your fingers on the trigger and shoot your targets when they appear on the screen. Your responsibilities will remain the same in Mr Bullet 2. You are playing the role of a brave spy in this brand new action-packed challenge. Make sure to aim at the other objects wisely to hit your enemy and clear the present level.

It is not going to be easy at all since you cannot win the level until you neutralize your opponents. Practice your shooting skills wisely, aim and shoot your enemies in each level! The complexities of level will keep increasing as you advance in this HTML5 shooting game! Do not forget to use your brain to find out the unique way to get rid of each of the enemies you meet in different levels. Use your bullets wisely as they are available in a limited number!

Make sure to implement the ricochet of bullet to take advantage and move to the advanced level. Feel free to unlock new characters with the help of the money you earn by completing the level! Common boys! It is time to practice your skills and prove the world that you are skilled enough to be the greatest hitman. This ruthless assassin wants your help again to make his job easy in another cool action-packed game. Make sure that his limited supply of ammo bounces off walls, platforms as well as other objects. Good luck having fun without download in this addictive physics game!
